## Mean of Fixed Price Job 

```{r}
# calculate mean of fixed price job for each keyword
plotdata <- data_selected %>%
  group_by(search_keyword) %>%
  summarize(mean_salary = mean(job_cost,na.rm = TRUE))
```

## Distribution of Jobs
```{r}

# How are they distributed ?

p <- ggplot(eliminated, aes(x = search_keyword, y = job_cost)) +
  geom_boxplot(size=1,
               outlier.shape = 1,
               outlier.color = "black",
               outlier.size  = 3) +
  scale_y_continuous(label = dollar) +
  labs(title = "Job Cost", 
       subtitle = "Outliers Removed Data",
       x = "",
       y = "") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  coord_flip()

p
```
